body:
Comment 9: 
On Mac OS X 10.6 goextlinkenabled is forced to be 0 in
http://golang.org/src/cmd/dist/unix.c#L701, this was to resolve issue #5130. Since binary
builds are made with a 10.6 machine, the issue exists for all OS X machines.

One way to fix this would be to make this check at run-time in 6l/8l (possibly by
modifying http://tip.golang.org/src/lib9/goos.c#L55).
